feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.35
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2026
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2030
  • Avoid OS version reconciliation for pseudo-versioned apps (#2023)
  • When importing configs via link, don't show dialog twice
  • GitHub - do not use filtered asset release dates (#2012)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.34...v1.1.35

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.36
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bugfix: GitHub fallback option was broken (#2032) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2033

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.35...v1.1.36

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.37
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • APKPure bugfix, Restore "Telegram App" source (#2025) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2043

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.36...v1.1.37

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.38
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2061
  • Upgrade to latest Flutter version (fix errors that were preventing this)
  • Fix button highlight visibility on black theme (#2039)
  • Improve German translation by @ColorfulRhino in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2059
  • Update de.json by @DwainZwerg in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2057
  • Update fr.json by @Kevinr99089 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2050
  • Update fa.json by @mxhdee in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2048
  • feat(i18n): Add Tencent App Store zh-Hans translations and add zh-Hans version of Obtainium badge by @ArcticFoxPro in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2044

New Contributors

  • @ColorfulRhino made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2059

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.37...v1.1.38

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.39
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2075:
  • Fix categories UI bug (#2064)
  • Fix how changelog quotes look in dark theme (#2065)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.38...v1.1.39
